# ixapi_role (Data Source)

Use the `role` data source to get a specifc role

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Get role by name
data "ixapi_role" "impl" {
  name = "implementation"
}

data "ixapi_role" "billing" {
  name = "billing"
}

data "ixapi_role" "peering" {
  name = "peering"
}

data "ixapi_role" "noc" {
  name = "noc"
}

data "ixapi_role" "legal" {
  name = "legal"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `name` (String) The name of the role.
- `required_fields` (List of String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
